docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
vScrawl is a secure digital signing platform that allows users to electronically sign, manage, and share documents. It is a modern digital signing solution designed to simplify how businesses and individuals handle documents online. Instead of printing, scanning, or mailing papers, vScrawl lets you sign securely, manage workflows, and share files instantly from anywhere. vScrawl ensures your documents are not only signed fast but also remain legally binding and tamper-proof. Whether you’re a professional, a business team, or an organization, the login page is your secure gateway to all vScrawl features.

Key Features

  • Secure Digital Signatures – Legally valid and encrypted electronic signatures.

  • Document Management – Upload, organize, and track your documents in one place.

  • Templates – Create reusable signing templates to save time.

  • Real-Time Tracking – Monitor signing progress with instant status updates.

  • Multi-Device Access – Use on desktop, tablet, or mobile for seamless work.

  • Collaboration – Invite multiple signers and assign signing roles.

  • Audit Trails – Full transparency with time-stamped signing history.

  • Compliance Ready – Meets international standards for digital signing and data security.

docs.title: Document Management
docs.text: The Dashboard is the central hub of vScrawl. From here, you can upload documents, track signing progress, and manage workflows.

docs.title: Sidebar Navigation
docs.text:
• All Documents – All uploaded documents.
  • Draft – Uploaded but not sent.
  • Pending – Waiting for signatures.
  • Sent – Sent out for signing.
  • Signed – Successfully signed.
  • Completed – Finalized and ready to download.
  • Void – Cancelled or invalid.

docs.title: Document List
docs.text: Shows details: Name, From, Status, Date, and Options (rename, delete, download).

docs.title: Search Bar
docs.text: Quickly filter documents by name, sender, or status.

docs.title: Uploading Documents
docs.text:
• Click Upload Document.
  • Choose between Sign Only or Sign with Others.
  • Upload up to 5 PDF files.
  • Reorder, rename, or remove before proceeding.
  • Add annotations (text, number, signature fields, etc.).

docs.title: Languages Support
docs.text: vScrawl supports multiple languages.

docs.title: Change Language
docs.text:
1. Locate the Language Dropdown (top-right).
  2. Click to expand options.
  3. Select your preferred language.
  4. The interface updates immediately.

Available Languages - English - Türkçe - Española

docs.title: Profile Settings
docs.text:
• Account Settings – Name, Username, Email.
  • Security Settings – Security question, 2FA.
  • Signature Settings – Default signature type & quotas.
  • Notification Settings – Alerts for sharing, signing, workflow completion, declines.

docs.title: Organization
docs.text: View organization details (name, owner).

docs.title: Users
docs.text:
• View and update roles.
  • Renew quotas.
  • Invite new users with roles and permissions.

docs.title: Business Apps
docs.text: Integrate external apps by providing: - Client ID - Name - Description - Callback URL

docs.title: Branding Settings
docs.text: Customize: - Header - Sidebar - Buttons

docs.title: Billing
docs.text: View credits, expiry dates, and package allocations.

docs.title: Roles
docs.text: Create custom roles with permissions (Billing, Branding, Templates, etc.) and assign to users.

docs.title: Accessing the Login Page
docs.text: Go to: vScrawl Login

docs.title: Enter Credentials
docs.text:
• Enter your registered email.
  • Type your password (case-sensitive).
  • Click Sign In.

docs.title: Alternative Sign In
docs.text:
• Google Authentication – Click Continue with Google.
  • Keycloak Authentication – Click Continue with Keycloak and enter your credentials.

After successful login, you are redirected to the vScrawl Dashboard.

docs.title: Create an Account
docs.text:
• Open a browser (Chrome, Edge, or Firefox) or Safari

  • Navigate to: vScrawl: #1 eSigning and CLM solution

  • Click “Sign Up”.

  • Provide your Full Name, Username, Email Address, Organization Name and password.

  • Select to agree the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy and click “Create your free account”.

  • An account activation email will be received, Verify your account → account gets activated → login from the Login page.

docs.title: Signing Workflows
docs.text: vScrawl supports multiple signing options.

docs.title: Simple Electronic Signature
docs.text:
• Upload → Sign Only.
  • Add signature and annotations.
  • Create signature by uploading, drawing, or typing.
  • Confirm signing → document is marked All Done.

docs.title: Digital Signatures
docs.text: Supports AES (Advanced) and QES (Qualified). Options: 1. vScrawl Signing Server – Set a secure password for AES. 2. eTugra Remote Signature Server – Approve via eTugra Auth mobile app. 3. Smart Card / USB Token – Requires eTugra Signer app and device drivers.

docs.title: Multi-User Signing
docs.text:
• Upload → Sign with Others.
  • Add signers with emails and assign signing order.
  • Place signature fields for each signer.
  • Send → each signer receives email to complete signing.

docs.title: Downloading
docs.text: Download documents and Certificate of Completion (Evidence Report) as ZIP or selectively.

docs.title: Signature Panel
docs.text: Displays all applied signatures and verifies document integrity.

docs.title: vScrawl Seal
docs.text: A sealing signature is applied by vScrawl to certify: - Document integrity. - All signatures are intact and verifiable. - Proof of signing through vScrawl.

docs.title: Templates
docs.text: Save document setups for reuse. Search, edit, rename, delete, or duplicate templates as needed.
